document.full_text: toshiba corp and sony corp are in talks to combine their units that make small and mid-size lcd panels for smartphones and tablet computers, and may sell a stake in the new entity to the japanese government for about $1.2 billion, sources said.
document.title: toshiba, sony plan to merge small lcd panel units: sources
lines_and_colors: toshiba corp and sony corp are in talks to combine their units that make small and mid-size lcd panels for smartphones and tablet computers, and may sell a stake in the new entity to the japanese government for about $1.2 billion, sources said.
